author: cms-patatrack
body:
#### PR description:

This PR contains all the development from he CMSSW_10_6_X_Patatrack branch, squashed as a single commit.

It is intended only for review, testing and for collecting comments. The actual merge will be done with a series of smaller PRs.
title: [do not merge] Squash all Patatrack developments on top of CMSSW_10_6_X
